attributes.action: STOP PAYING PRIVATE CARE-HOMES BETWEEN £3000 AND £4500 PER-WEEK TO ACCOMODATE SEX-OFFENDERS UNDER THE AGE OF NINETEEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to ask the Prime-Minister why Local Authority Social Service Departments are paying private companies huge amounts of tax-payers money to "care" for convicted sex-offenders who re-offend within a few months of leaving these institutions when parents of disabled children recieve peanuts in comparison WHY? Why do decent people who have children with disabilities through no fault of their own have to constantly battle with social-services to get a few hours per-week support when child-molesters serial rapists are taken out ten-pin bowling cinema horse-riding rock-climbing etc Where is the justice in that?
